name: Adventure Trek Package
description:
Embark on an exhilarating trekking adventure in the scenic surroundings of Shimla with a 4-day, 3-night package at Hotel Sansar. Explore the breathtaking trails of nearby mountains and valleys during the day and unwind in the comfort of your Standard Room in the evenings. Package includes accommodation, breakfast, trekking guide, and packed lunches.
Price: ₹7,500 for 3 nights/4 days

name: Winter Wonderland Package
description:
Experience the magic of winter in Shimla with a 3-day, 2-night package at Hotel Sansar. Enjoy snowfall, build snowmen, and indulge in snowball fights during the day, and cozy up in the warmth of your Super Deluxe Room at night. Package includes accommodation, breakfast, and complimentary hot beverages.
Price: ₹6,000 for 2 nights/3 days

name: Family Fun in Manali & Solang Valley
description:
A family-friendly package designed to create unforgettable memories. Enjoy guided tours, family-oriented activities, and comfortable stays.
Price: ₹6,500 per person

name: Old Manali & Manali Adventure with Meals
description:
Explore the scenic beauty and cultural charm of both Old Manali and Manali with this balanced package. Perfect for families and groups, this package offers a mix of guided tours, adventure activities, and relaxation, along with inclusive meals.

Price: ₹6,500 per person

name: Package luxuryss
description: comes with 3 meals breakfast, lunch, dinner and pool locations

name: Old Manali & Manali Adventure with Meals
description:
Explore the scenic beauty and cultural charm of both Old Manali and Manali with this balanced package. Perfect for families and groups, this package offers a mix of guided tours, adventure activities, and relaxation, along with inclusive meals.

Price: ₹6,500 per person

name: Himalayan Adventure in McLeod Ganj
description: Embark on an exhilarating adventure in McLeod Ganj, where the majestic Himalayas meet rich Tibetan culture. Trek through scenic trails, explore ancient monasteries, and enjoy the vibrant local markets. Perfect for adventure seekers and culture enthusiasts alike.

name: Shimla Mall Road Escape
description: Experience the charm of Shimla's Mall Road with our 4-day, 3-night package. Explore the bustling markets, colonial architecture, and scenic views of the Himalayas. Visit Christ Church, stroll along the Ridge, and shop for local handicrafts and souvenirs. Enjoy traditional Himachali cuisine at local eateries and relax in comfortable accommodations near Mall Road.

name: Kufri Adventure Retreat
description: Embark on an adventurous retreat to Kufri with our 4-day, 3-night package. Explore the picturesque landscapes, enjoy thrilling activities, and immerse yourself in nature's beauty. Visit Kufri Fun World for amusement rides and panoramic views of the Himalayas. Take a horse ride to Mahasu Peak for stunning vistas and serene surroundings. Experience local culture and cuisine, with comfortable accommodations in Kufri.

name: Kufri Nature Retreat
description: Escape to the tranquil beauty of Kufri with our 4-day, 3-night nature retreat package. Explore serene landscapes, pine forests, and panoramic mountain views. Visit Kufri Zoo to see Himalayan wildlife species up close. Enjoy horse riding or yak riding amidst the picturesque surroundings. Experience local culture with visits to nearby villages and taste authentic Himachali cuisine. Stay in comfortable accommodations with views of the Himalayas.

name: Old Manali Heritage Tour
description: Discover the vibrant Mall Road of Manali with our 4-day, 3-night package. Stroll through bustling markets, explore local shops, and indulge in delicious Himachali cuisine at cozy cafes. Visit Tibetan Monastery for cultural insights and shopping for handicrafts. Enjoy leisurely walks along the Beas River and panoramic views of the Himalayas. Stay in comfortable accommodations near Mall Road.

name: Dharamshala Cultural Retreat
description:
Immerse yourself in the cultural richness of Dharamshala with our 4-day, 3-night retreat package. Explore the serene landscapes, Tibetan monasteries, and bustling markets. Visit Tsuglagkhang Complex, the residence of Dalai Lama, and Namgyal Monastery for spiritual insights. Enjoy local Tibetan cuisine at authentic eateries, with breakfast and dinner included daily at the hotel. Stay in comfortable accommodations with views of the Dhauladhar ranges.
Meals: Daily breakfast and dinner at the hotel

name: Solang Valley Adventure Retreat
description:
Embark on an adventurous retreat to Solang Valley with our 4-day, 3-night package. Enjoy thrilling activities such as paragliding or zorbing amidst breathtaking landscapes. Explore the serene beauty of Solang Valley with leisurely walks and photography sessions. Indulge in delicious meals featuring Himachali cuisine, with breakfast, lunch, and dinner included daily. Stay in comfortable accommodations with panoramic views of the snow-capped mountains.
Meals: Daily breakfast, lunch, and dinner

name: Kasol Nature Escape
description: Experience the natural beauty of Kasol with our 4-day, 3-night nature escape package. Explore the tranquil landscapes, pine forests, and gushing Parvati River. Visit Manikaran Sahib Gurudwara for its hot springs and spiritual significance. Indulge in delicious meals featuring local Himachali cuisine, with breakfast, lunch, and dinner included daily. Stay in comfortable accommodations amidst the scenic views of Kasol.
